SummaryEnglish: The human race is not the only species on Earth. There are actually two other races that live there as well. The Makai, which is a demon race, and the Juujinkai, a half-man, half-beast race. Once every three thousand years, a super being called the Chouji, the Overfiend will appear and bring balance to all three realms.

1.SummaryEnglish: The human race is not the only species on Earth. There are actually two other races that live there as well. The Makai, which is a demon race, and the Juujinkai, a half-man, half-beast race. Once every three thousand years, a super being called the Chouji, the Overfiend will appear and bring balance to all three realms.

Amano Jyaku is searching the earth for a being known as the "Overfiend", who is scheduled to appear and create a new eternal paradise. He thinks he's found the dormant being in a Japanese college student, but a demon warrior is intent on preventing the young man from reaching his potential. Will Amano be able to protect his discovery? Should he? After all, if the Overfiend is here to create a new world, what's going to happen to this one?

3.SummaryEnglish: As the Overfiend slumbers, the mad emperor Caesar rises to power, enslaving a new race of demon beasts.

2.SummaryEnglish: In this sequel to Urotsukidoji: Legend of the Overfiend, the unbelievable sexual violence of the Overfiend and his cohorts from Hell continues to wreak havoc on the earth. Who can stop this relentless onslaught?

1.TitleEnglish: A Prayer for the Resurrection of the Lord of Chaos

3.SummaryEnglish: As the Overfiend slumbers, the mad emperor Caesar rises to power, enslaving a new race of demon beasts. Into this cruel existence is born the Lord of Chaos, the Overfiend's nemesis. As the blood-thirsty beasts capture the tyrant's daughter in a brutal coup, the Overfiend must awaken to an apocalyptic battle of the gods.

4.SummaryEnglish: Continuing straight after the climax of Return of the Overfiend, Jyaku and the survivors head for Osaka to help the Overfiend after his climactic battle. On the way, they find a kingdom where children rule over adults. Jyaku’s problems are furthered when an old nemesis shows up at the wrong time.

5.SummaryEnglish: A century after the merging of the three worlds, the true Chōjin is born, creating a hermaphroditic race to destroy all remaining life on Earth. Akemi awakens in a hospital beside Jyaku, who barely survived his clash with the ever-shifting Chōjin. The Destroyer God Tatsuo, thought dead, returns and continues his destruction. Still in love with him, Akemi sets out to find Tatsuo, while Jyaku battles the Chōjin’s new immortal offspring. When Akemi finally reaches Tatsuo, he nearly kills her, but Jyaku intervenes at the last moment, only to be condemned by her for doing so. Witnessing the devastation and the Chōjin’s corruption, Jyaku loses faith and ultimately declares war on the god he once served, setting the stage for humanity’s final resistance.
